dialogue.name: Roland
dialogue.content: It's been a while since I've been here...

dialogue.name: Roland
dialogue.content: Excuse me! An order for one please!

dialogue.name: Roland
dialogue.content: Since you are new here, I will introduce you to the best food you can ever taste in this city.

dialogue.name: Roland
dialogue.content: Of course, peeping through my book like that, eh?

dialogue.name: Angela
dialogue.content: Never I wished to, but had no choice.

dialogue.name: Roland
dialogue.content: Well, It's not like I'm not blaming you for it...

dialogue.name: Roland
dialogue.content: Forget the irritating subject, let's enjoy ourselves with some nice menus they have here.

dialogue.name: Angela
dialogue.content: Even if you say so, I am not quite familiar with foods.

dialogue.name: Roland
dialogue.content: Why, I'm sure none of you are, actually...

dialogue.name: Roland
dialogue.content: That's why you have me here today. Your royal servant,Roland at your service

dialogue.name: Roland
dialogue.content: It may not be a great place to invite a lady over, but the food makes up for it.
